Text: ENJOY Zombie Undead 2011 DVDRip by P2P!

A - 10
V - 10
Movie - God awful!  

According to the pic George A Romero "Cant wait for Zombie Undead"! Well hope you thought it was worth the wait George! So poorly acted the children at my 3 year old nieces play group would have put in a better performance!  Wholly unoriginal and boringly predictable! If you like Zombie movies avoid it like the zombie plague itself!
oh dear god I'm gonna need to smoke myself into a coma to make it through this aren't I..
Uh I dunno, to me the word zombie and the word undead put together sounds kinda fuckin' dumb as I always assumed zombies actually WERE themselves undead!!
